list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: of the color of milk or fresh snow, due to the reflection of most wavelengths of visible light; the opposite of black.
belonging to or denoting a human group having light-colored skin (chiefly used of peoples of European extraction).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một cộng đồng nông nghiệp trắng
hoa garnet-đỏ đánh dấu với màu trắng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the visible pale part of the eyeball around the iris.
the outer part (white when cooked) which surrounds the yolk of an egg; the albumen.
a member of a light-skinned people, especially one of European extraction.
a white or cream butterfly that has dark veins or spots on the wings. It can be a serious crop pest.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: your passion hath whited your face
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: niềm đam mê của bạn đã làm phiền khuôn mặt của bạn
